text: Binɨb mapen yad okok. God chɨnop gɨnɨgayn agɨl takaw aglak anɨb ak, chɨn nɨg dɨpun. Anɨb ak tek, gɨ tɨmel gɨpun gach ak sek, gos tɨmel nopun gach ak sek mɨdupsek wik yokɨnɨgun. Wik yokɨl, God muk okok mɨdɨl, ne bɨ jel gup ak nɨŋɨd nɨm, tap asɨŋ okok pɨsnep kelɨgɨnɨgun. Kelɨgɨl, binɨb suŋtep ne yɨbɨl okok pel yonɨgun.
